title: Coach's whimsical Wizard Of Oz collection is already selling out
text:
Wizard Of Oz Highline Tote In Signature Canvas With Patches More

Yahoo Lifestyle Canada is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

It’s been 80 years since The Wizard of Oz brought us Dorothy and her beloved band of friends, and the film is just as beloved now as when it first hit the big screen.

As part of a new limited edition release, Coach has paired up with Warner Bros. to present a special limited edition collection.

From wristlets inspired by Dorothy’s ruby red slippers to charms featuring Tin Man and The Scarecrow, take a look at a few of our favourite pieces from the collab!

Wizard Of Oz Highline Tote With Motif More

A go-everywhere design with plenty of room for the essentials, this spacious Highline Tote is crafted of crossgrain leather featuring the iconic ruby red slippers as well as a bag charm.

SHOP IT: Coach, $225

Wizard Of Oz Boxed Small Wristlet With Motif More

This colourful and cute wristlet is perfectly sized for cards, cash and a phone.

SHOP IT: Coach, $115

Wizard Of Oz Boxed Slim Accordion Zip Wallet In Signature Canvas With Patches More

Crafted of Coach’s Signature canvas featuring three magical movie-inspired patches, this expandable design unzips to reveal a spacious interior. It holds an iPhone X and has eight card slots, two full-length bill compartments and a coin pocket to keep essentials organized.

SHOP IT: Coach, $195

Wizard Of Oz Scarecrow Bear Bag Charm More

Add a smart touch to a favorite bag or set of keys with this pebble leather Scarecrow Bear bag charm,

SHOP IT: Coach, $175

Boxed Mini Skinny Id Case More

The perfect accessory to complement Dorothy’s slippers.

SHOP IT: Coach, $95
description: We're off to see the Wizard!
